trans-unit.source: Running the Network Server with user authentication

seg-source.mrk: Running the Network Server with user authentication

target.mrk: Running the Network Server with user authentication

trans-unit.source: By default, the Network Server boots with user authentication disabled. However, it is strongly recommended that you run your Network Server with user authentication enabled.

seg-source.mrk: By default, the Network Server boots with user authentication disabled.
However, it is strongly recommended that you run your Network Server with user authentication enabled.

target.mrk: By default, the Network Server boots with user authentication disabled.
However, it is strongly recommended that you run your Network Server with user authentication enabled.

trans-unit.source: For details on how to enable user authentication, see "Working with user authentication" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"/>.

seg-source.mrk: For details on how to enable user authentication, see "Working with user authentication" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"/>.

target.mrk: For details on how to enable user authentication, see "Working with user authentication" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"/>.
